title: White House Down
summary: The North-American President James Sawyer proposes a global peace plan frustrating the arms industry. Meanwhile Capitol security agent John Cale had made an application for the secret service to protect the president and travels for an interview with Agent Finnerty in Washington with his eleven year-old daughter Emily. Cale is not accepted and he goes with Emily on a tour in the White House. Out of the blue, the White House is invaded and overtaken by a terrorist group led by Stenz, and Cale fights against the paramilitary group to save his daughter and the president while disclosing high treason and coup d'Ã©tat sponsored by the arms industry.
cast: Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal
